animeDescription: Super-deformed version of Hokuto no Ken, Buronson & Hara Tetsuo's post-apocalyptic fighting manga.Note: The "DD" stands for "Design Deformation," since the characters are only "two-heads-tall."(Source: AniDB)
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: DD Hokuto no Ken', 'Alternative version: DD Hokuto no Ken (2013)']
